<nowiki>[[File:IconsPage/hardware.png]]</nowiki> '''ISDN cards supported by mISDN'''
----

* The mISDN suite currently includes two hardware-specific drivers:

** hfcpci (for most HFC-PCI cards) 
** avmfritz (for AVM ISDN cards)

==== PCI cards ====

* AVM Fritz! PCI cards

* Cologne Chips Design HFC-PCI based cards

** HFC-2BS0 PCI cards
** Sitecom DC-105

* Sedlbauer Speedfax+

* Winbond 6692 PCI chip based cards

==== PnP cards ====

* AVM PnP cards

<<BR>>
* Source: ('semi-official')   <nowiki>[[http://rcum.uni-mb.si/~uvp00845b/|mISDN howto]]</nowiki>

<<BR>><<BR>>

<nowiki>[[File:IconsPage/hardware.png]]</nowiki> '''ISDN cards supported by isdn4linux'''
----

* The isdn4linux suite includes the "Hi''''''Sax" driver that covers almost all passive ISDN cards 

==== PCI ====

* AVM Fritz!Card PCI (Teledat 150 PCI)
* AVM Fritz!Card PCI (2.0)

* Berkom Telekom A4T

* Dr. Neuhaus Niccy PCI

* Eicon.Diehl Diva 2.01 PCI

* ELSA Quickstep 1000 PCI (new name Microlink PCI)
* ELSA Quickstep 3000 PCI

* Gazel ISDN cards (PCI)

* HFC-PCI based cards
* HFC-S+, HFC-SP/PCMCIA cards  

* Sedlbauer Speed Card PCI
* Sedlbauer Speedfax

* Teles PCI

* Traverse Technologie NETjet PCI S0 card and NETspider U card

==== ISA & PnP ====

* ACER P10

* ASUSCOM ISDNLink 128K PC adapter (order code I-IN100-ST-D)
** Dynalink IS64PH (OEM version of ASUSCOM ISDNLink 128K adapter)
** All other ASUSCOM/Dynalink cards (includes OEM versions; in total more than 50 card versions)
** PCBIT-DP (OEM version of ASUSCOM ISDNLink)

* AVM A1 (Fritz, Teledat 150 ISA)
* AVM Fritz! PnP

* Compaq ISDN S0 ISA card

* Dr. Neuhaus Niccy PnP

* Eicon DIVA 2.0 ISA (S0 and U interface, no PRO version)
* Eicon.Diehl Diva 2.01 ISA, and Diva 2.02
* Eicon DIVA Piccola
* Eicon.Diehl Diva ISA PnP

* ELSA Microlink PCC-16, PCF, PCF-Pro, PCC-8
* ELSA Quickstep 1000
* ELSA Quickstep 3000 (same settings as QS1000)

* Gazel ISDN cards (ISA)
* ST5481 based USB ISDN adapters, e.g. Be''''''Wan Gazel 128 USB

* HFC-2BS0 based cards (Tele''''''Int SA1)
* HFC-S+, HFC-SP cards
* HFC-USB ISDN TAs

* HSR Saphir

* ITK ix1-micro Rev.2 (also: ITK colombus card)

* ith Kommunikationstechnik GmbH MIC 16 ISA card

* Sedlbauer Speed Card (Speed Win, Teledat 100, Fax+)
* Sedlbauer ISDN-Controller PC/104

* Scitel Quadro

* Siemens I-Surf 1.x (with ISAR =< try type 29)
* Siemens I-Surf 2.x (with IPAC => try type 12 asuscom)

* Teles 16.0
* Teles 16.3 (non PnP)
* Teles 16.3c PnP (can not be used as reversed card)
* Teles  8.0
** Creatix PnP S0
** Creatix S''''''0Box

* Trust PCI (only the old one with Siemens chip; the one called 'Wisecom' in NL does not work)

* USR Sportster internal TA (compatible Stollmann tina-pp V3)

* PCI/Winbond W6692 based cards

==== PCMCIA ====

* AVM Fritz! PCMCIA - does not work in Edgy
* ELSA PCMCIA
* HFC 2BDS0 SP/PCMCIA cards
* Sedlbauer Speed Star / Speed Star 2 (PCMCIA)
* Teles 16.3 PCMCIA

==== S2M cards ====

* The following S2M cards reportedly work:

*** AVM T1
*** Eicon S2M-ISA or DIVA Server PRI family (see http://www.melware.de/en/)

----

==== Active ISDN cards ====

* The following active cards are supported through an individual driver

*** AVM B1
*** AVM C4
*** Eicon DIVA Server BRI PCI
*** Eicon DIVA Server 4BRI
*** IBM Active 2000 ISDN card
*** ICN
*** PCBIT-D
